name: Powerbot
description:
Powerbot

Game made in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 39. Theme: Running out of Power.

You are a robot and humanity doesn't trust in machines anymore. Save yourself from the humans trying to destroy you and your power source.

Gameplay

Powerbot is a fast-paced top-down shooter game where you have to keep the robot's power source charged by moving energy from energy source. You have to use your little body to transfers energy.

Developers

@usermarcel and @hiro_jazdo
